      • positionMatOr

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Float> positionMatOr(com.esri.core.geometry.Point locUser,
                                            com.esri.core.geometry.Point pt,
                                            float[] orMat,
                                            float zDef)
        Function which projects the point pt on the screen using a perspective projection defined by the information about the location of the user and the orientation of the device (based on http://aldream.net/article/2013-04-13-painter-s-algorithm/)
        Parameters:
        locUser: - the location of the user/device
        pt: - the location of the point that we want to project
        orMat: - the orientation matrix of the device
        Returns:
        the position on the captor of the poi

      • isBetween

        public static boolean isBetween(double minAngle,
                double maxAngle,
                double angle)
        Function which verifies if the angle is between minAngle and maxAngle of the theoretical azimuth
        Parameters:
        minAngle: - minimal angle value for the azimuth
        maxAngle: - maximal angle value for the azimuth
        angle: - the angle
        Returns:
        a boolean(true if angle is between minAngle and maxAngle, false else)
